name: datahub-ui
description: Reusable components for Planet OS Datahub
author: Christophe Viau

scripts.build: rollup index-rollup.js -o dist/datahub.js -f umd -n datahub -g d3:d3,leaflet:L,d3-scale-chromatic:d3
scripts.build-watch: rollup index-rollup.js -o dist/datahub.js -w -f umd -n datahub -g d3:d3,leaflet:L,d3-scale-chromatic:d3
scripts.build-min: rollup index-rollup.js -f umd -n datahub -g d3:d3,leaflet:L,d3-scale-chromatic:d3 | uglifyjs -o ./dist/datahub-min.js -c -m
